title: With
description: With is a consulting agency based in Paris and Madrid. We worked together to create a dynamic, fully-animated web experience for their corporate website.

title: LeGramme
description: LeGramme is a jewel designer based in Paris. We collaborated on a clean, brand-focused e-shop website during a year and a half.

title: White Bird
description: White Brid is a jewel brand that regroups dozens of jewel designers. They sell their creations worldwide, and needed a beautiful e-shop to do so. We worked together for 2 years, and still do today.

title: Beaubourg
description: Beaubourg was a creative agency, where I worked as an intern. One of my first asssignments was rebuilding their display site, which won a Developer of the day at Awwwards.
